title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The bug report is about the incorrect enablement of the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective. Even if the user goes to Preferences -> Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification", the build menu option still appears in the Java popup menus. This behavior is believed to be incorrect.
OB: In the Java perspective, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled, despite the user selecting "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences.
EB: In the Java perspective, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu should only be enabled if the user has not selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences.
SR: The bug can be reproduced by following these steps: 1. Open the Java perspective. 2. Go to Preferences -> Workbench. 3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification". 4. Right-click on a resource in the Java perspective and observe that the "Build" action is still enabled in the popup menu.
